top_stories.title: NVIDIA Unveils New Open Models, Data and Tools to Advance AI Across Every Industry
top_stories.description: Expanding the open model universe, NVIDIA today released new open models, data and tools to advance AI across every industry. These models — spanning the NVIDIA Nemotron family for agentic AI, the NVIDIA Cosmos platform for physical AI, the new NVIDIA Alpamayo family for autonomous vehicle development, NVIDIA Isaac GR00T for robotics and NVIDIA Clara Read Article
top_stories.author: Kari Briski
top_stories.content: Expanding the open model universe, NVIDIA today released new open models, data and tools to advance AI across every industry. top_stories.title: Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents
top_stories.description: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. Instead of forcing a model to read a giant prompt in one pass, RLMs treat the prompt as an external environment and let the model decide how to inspect it with code, then recursively call […] The post Recursive Language Models (RLMs): From MIT’s Blueprint to Prime Intellect’s RLMEnv for Long Horizon LLM Agents appeared first on MarkTechPost.
top_stories.author: Asif Razzaq
top_stories.content: Recursive Language Models aim to break the usual trade off between context length, accuracy and cost in large language models. top_stories.title: JBL expands Tune Series with long-lasting ANC headphones at CES 2026
top_stories.description: At CES 2026 in Las Vegas on January 5, 2026, JBL announced expansions to its Tune Series headphones, introducing models with enhanced sound, upgraded performance, and new designs to match everyday listening requirements. The new collection includes the JBL Tune 780NC over-ear headphones and JBL Tune 680NC on-ear headphones, which bring Adaptive Noise Cancelling and […]
top_stories.author: Kerem Gülen

top_stories.title: CES 2026: New Galaxy features aim to spot dementia symptoms early
top_stories.description: Samsung announced at its CES 2026 First Look event that Galaxy wearables will detect early signs of dementia through tracking changes in speech, movement, and daily activity, aiming to provide early warnings for users and families to seek medical care, with beta rollout in select markets. The company concluded its First Look event at CES […]
top_stories.author: Kerem Gülen

top_stories.title: The Global Games Market Is Projected To Generate $272B By The End Of The Year
top_stories.description: The post The Global Games Market Is Projected To Generate $272B By The End Of The Year by Emily Lew appeared first on Benzinga. Visit Benzinga to get more great content like this. Gameflip is a cutting-edge marketplace for gamers, designed to let you easily buy, sell, and “flip” your gaming items. With a growing community of over 7 million users and more than $180 million in lifetime sales, this venture is funded by Silicon Valley VCs, including pioneers who invested early in Zynga, and PayPal,...
